mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "What Are They Dancing?", "Constructing a Float", "The Big Events of 1984", "Writing A Round", "A New Look At Mainstream", "The Quarterly Movement Report", "Dancing in Biblical Times" and "33rd National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Contra Corner", "Mostly Modular", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
